Robert Williams (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Williams_(actor) 0 Robert Williams (September 15, 1894 – November 3, 1931) was an American stage and film actor. He is best known for his first, and only, leading role in the 1931 romantic comedy Platinum Blonde, opposite Loretta Young and Jean Harlow. Williams died of peritonitis three days after the film's premiere. Robert_Williams ( September_15_,_1894 – November_3_,_1931 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actor . He is_best_known for his_first , and only , leading_role in the_1931_romantic_comedy_Platinum_Blonde , opposite_Loretta_Young and Jean_Harlow . Williams died of peritonitis_three_days after the_film 's_premiere .
